name: Zombie Pixels
description:
Zombie Pixels was originally made in October 2016 and recreated in September 2022 to upload to the web

This was the very first game I made using the original Game Maker Studio. As simple as it is I'm proud of what it represents as the beginning of my game development journey.

Thank you for playing!

*5tarby*

How To Play:

Move Player: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Spacebar
